Oct. 20, 2019 D Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest (Lower Sections)
Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest (Lower Sections) 15 Entertainments Contest Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest oxfordshire-district-bba-entertainment-c-6392
None
Marlborough School, Woodstock, Oxfordshire, England, UK Music adjudicator: Duncan Beckley; Entertainment adjudicator: Gordon Eddison
Best Unregistered (Music): Chinnor Training Best Unregistered (Entertainment/Presentation): City of Oxford Training Best 4th Section (Music): Reading Spring Gardens Best 4th Section (Entertainment/Presentation): Hemel Hempstead Best 3rd Section: Olney Brass
